name: USONI: The Game
description:
In 2063, in a chaotic world in which Europe is dead due to global warming, nuclear catastrophes, and climate change, USONI is the story of Ophelia and Ulysses, two lovers on a post apocalyptic journey from the Mediterranean sea to the shores of Lake Turkana.

The game set in the year 2063, when Europe has exhausted all its resources, Africa becomes the cradle of hope, and all have their eye set on the hope of seeing the sun.

Usoni is a journey to a future… to a better life in Africa.

PC and Android Version Out Now!!
